Hi Srimaan,

I assume that your question regards the Eclipse plugins. To wr=
ite a
JUnit Plug-in Test do the same procedures as for an ordinary plugin.
=
Then declare the JUnit plugin and the plugin you want to test as a
dependen=
cies for the Test Plug-in. Then run the TestCase by invoking
Run As JUnit P=
lug-in Test.

Before I had problems with this issue and the Eclipse newsgro=
ups  were
more useful to me, especially
news://news.eclipse.org/eclipse.too=
ls.jdt.
